Package org.csc.phynixx.loggersystem.logrecord

Interface Summary
IDataRecord a single record is consistent set logged data. this data is stored as byte[][]

The write order ist kept.
IDataRecordReplay replays the logrecord in the correct order.
IDataRecordSequence  
ILogRecordReader  
ILogRecordReplayListener  
ILogRecordWriter  
IManagedDataRecordLogger a record logger that can releases its resources
IXADataRecorder logs binary data.
IXADataRecorderLifecycleListener  
IXARecorderRepository XAResource logger is specialized to support the logging of a xaresource to rollback/recover the resource in the context of an transaction manager.
IXARecorderResourceListener  
PhynixxXARecorderRepository.IEventDeliver  
 

Class Summary
PhynixxXADataRecorder thisclas is backwards bound to the PhynixxXARecorderRepository.
PhynixxXARecorderRepository XAResource logger is specialized to support the logging of a xaresource to rollback/recover the resource in the context of an transaction manager.
XADataLogger brings IXADataRecorder and dataLoger together.
XALogRecordType
